channel.title: Help slowing down skill training and reseting starting items to nothing
channel.description: ok sorry yall i know these are on the tuts section but i'm having real difficulty with these even with the tuts. what I'm wanting to do is slow down the exp rate of ALL other skills (i was able to do it for att,def,str,range,hp) I need to also change my theiving in game. basically the stalls are right outside the home area and give WAY too much money for my kind of server. I need to change that. and third I need to set the starting items to nothing. Yes I have followed tuts but my server is being stupid and wont even change. can some1 please post back if you have an answer for me. thanks.
